ep_email_notifications.headerGritterSubs: Get an email notification when someone else edits this pad:
ep_email_notifications.msgOptionsNotChec: You need to check at least one checkbox.
ep_email_notifications.msgParamsMissing: Settings for the 'email_Notifications' plugin are missing.  Please contact your administrator.
ep_email_notifications.msgAlreadySubscr: You are already registered for emails for this pad
ep_email_notifications.msgUnsubscrNotExi: This email address is not registered for this pad
ep_email_notifications.msgSubscrSuccess: An email was sent to your address.  Open the link in it to validate your subscription.
ep_email_notifications.msgUnsubscrSucces: An email was sent to your address.  Open the link in it to validate your unsubscription.
